Artist: or possibly by Marcantonio Franceschini (Italian, Bologna 1648–1729 Bologna)
Medium: Brush and brown wash, highlighted with white and cream gouache (partly oxidized), over a preliminary freehand and ruled underdrawing in charcoal, outlines stylus-incised for transfer, on four glued sheets of light tan paper with deckled borders.  Traces of framing outlines stylus-ruled along upper, right, and bottom borders
Dimensions: 18-1/8 x 14-3/16 in.  (46 x 36 cm), irregular borders
